languages.text: "Нельзя изуродовать труп и остаться чистым. Ищите любые запачканные кровью предметы одежды, тряпье и тому подобное".
"One cannot disfigure a body like that and stay clean. Look for any bloodstained garments, rags, or the like."
languages.original_text: "Нельзя изуродовать труп и остаться чистым. Ищите любые запачканные кровью предметы одежды, тряпье и тому подобное".

traits.locale_text: "One cannot disfigure the body and stay clean. Look for any bloodstained garments, rags or the like."
"One cannot disfigure the body and stay clean. Look for any bloodstained garments, rags or the like."
"One cannot disfigure a body like that and stay clean. Look for any bloodstained garments, rags, or the like."

"One cannot disfigure a body like that and stay clean. Look for any bloodstained garments, rags, or the like."
"One cannot disfigure a body like that and stay clean. Look for any bloodstained garments, rags, or the like."

languages.text: "Man kann eine Leiche nicht so zurichten, ohne sich schmutzig zu machen. Sucht nach blutigen Kleidungsstücken, Lumpen, etwas in der Art."
languages.original_text: "One cannot disfigure a body like that and stay clean. Look for any bloodstained garments, rags, or the like."

traits.locale_text: "Man kann eine Leiche nicht so zurichten, ohne sich schmutzig zu machen. Sucht nach blutigen Kleidungsstücken, Lumpen, etwas in der Art."

languages.text: « Défigurer un corps de la sorte nécessite forcément de se salir. Cherchez des vêtements ou autres guenilles tachés de sang. »
languages.original_text: "One cannot disfigure a body like that and stay clean. Look for any bloodstained garments, rags, or the like."

traits.locale_text: « Défigurer un corps de la sorte nécessite forcément de se salir. Cherchez des vêtements ou autres guenilles tachés de sang. »

languages.text: «Es imposible desfigurar así un cadáver sin mancharse. Busquen ropa ensangrentada, trapos y cosas similares».
languages.original_text: "One cannot disfigure a body like that and stay clean. Look for any bloodstained garments, rags, or the like."

traits.locale_text: «Es imposible desfigurar así un cadáver sin mancharse. Busquen ropa ensangrentada, trapos y cosas similares».

languages.text: 「あんな風に死体を傷つけてきれいな姿のままでいることなどできない。血の付いた衣服やボロ布といったものを探せ」
languages.original_text: "One cannot disfigure a body like that and stay clean. Look for any bloodstained garments, rags, or the like."

traits.locale_text: 「あんな風に死体を傷つけてきれいな姿のままでいることなどできない。血の付いた衣服やボロ布といったものを探せ」

languages.text: “把尸体搞成了这个样子，那个凶手身上不可能干干净净。看看能不能找到带血的衣服、破布之类的东西。”
languages.original_text: "One cannot disfigure a body like that and stay clean. Look for any bloodstained garments, rags, or the like."

traits.locale_text: “把尸体搞成了这个样子，那个凶手身上不可能干干净净。看看能不能找到带血的衣服、破布之类的东西。”

languages.text: "Bir cesedi böyle kesip biçtikten sonra üstün başın muhakkak kirlenir. Gözünüz kana bulanmış kıyafetlerde, paçavralarda filan olsun."
languages.original_text: "One cannot disfigure a body like that and stay clean. Look for any bloodstained garments, rags, or the like."
